synonym.mean: 迷住，缠住；使…着迷；使…困扰

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 强迫性的；着迷的；分神的
过分地；着迷地，着魔似地
痴迷；困扰；[内科][心理] 强迫观念

bilingual.source: He tends to obsess over minor details.
Don't obsess over things you can't change.
bilingual.target: 不要对你无法改变的事情着迷。

bilingual.source: He began to obsess about his health after the diagnosis.
bilingual.target: 诊断之后，他开始对自己的健康着迷。

bilingual.source: It's easy to obsess over social media likes and comments.
bilingual.target: 很容易对社交媒体上的点赞和评论着迷。

bilingual.source: She will obsess about her appearance before every big event.
bilingual.target: 她在每次重大活动前都会对自己的外表着迷。

bilingual.source: To do this successfully, their brain prompts them to think and even obsess about others.
bilingual.target: 为了成功做到这一点，他们的大脑促使他们思考，甚至痴迷于他人。

bilingual.source: I must admit that maps obsess me.
bilingual.target: 我得承认我对地图十分着迷。
但不要沉迷在不相关的事情。

bilingual.source: Dan: Yes, but two years to obsess over it.
bilingual.target: 是，不过我念念不忘了两年。

list.abstract: 《Obsess》是SS501演唱的歌曲，所属专辑《为爱重生 Rebirth 》。
obsess是一个英语单词，动词，作动词时意为“使痴迷，使迷恋；使心神不宁，不停地困扰； 唠叨；挂牵，念念不忘”。

yingyinNormal.en: They obsess over one thing and they can't let it go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 沉迷于某种事物，无法释怀。

yingyinNormal.en: And this was a sexual case, too? Yes, prostitution. Lockhart/Gardner just seems to obsess on these sexual cases.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也是个性犯罪案件吗？是的，卖淫案。洛&加律所似乎对性犯罪案件很着迷。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, we'll never make it. No. Don't obsess over the way of life's problems. Remember the funny movie where the dog dies?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，我们做不到的。不，不，不...别被生活上的一点小困难打倒，还记得那部狗死了的喜剧吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It amazes me how you constantly obsess over fictional details when there are more important things in the real world to worry about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对虚构情节如此着迷实在让我费解，现实世界中还有很多重要的事等着你呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 着迷；困扰人的念头

word_family.mean: v. 迷住；使着迷；使心神不宁；不停地困扰；挥之不去；对…着迷

sense_info_list.en: preoccupy or fill the mind of someone continually, intrusively, and to a troubling extent

examination_example.sentence: Rather than <highlight>obsessing</highlight> over the scale, turn your focus to how you look, feel, how your clothes fit and your overall energy level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其纠结于体重秤，不如将你的注意力转移到你的外表、感觉、衣服的合身程度以及你的整体能量水平上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人着迷的；着迷的；心神不定的
n. 着迷；困扰人的念头

word_family.mean: v. 迷住；使着迷；使心神不宁；不停地困扰；挥之不去；对…着迷

sense_info_list.en: preoccupy or fill the mind of someone continually, intrusively, and to a troubling extent

examination_example.sentence: No matter what slimming products we <highlight>obsess</highlight> ourselves with, at the end of the day there's no magic trick to shape up for the summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论我们沉迷于什么样的减肥产品，最终都没有为夏天塑身的魔术。

examination_example.sentence: Hale wasn't just a writer, she was also a fierce social advocate, and she was particularly <highlight>obsessed</highlight> with an ideal New England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hale 不仅是作家，还是一位激进的社会拥护者，而且她特别痴迷于理想的新英格兰。

examination_example.sentence: To do this successfully, their brain prompts them to think and even <highlight>obsess</highlight> about others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了成功做到这一点，他们的大脑促使他们思考，甚至痴迷于他人。

sense_info_list.en: preoccupy or fill the mind of someone continually; intrusively; and to a troubling extent
(of a person) be preoccupied with or constantly worrying about something
